attributes.title: Tokio Marine GAAP EPS of ¥351.59, net premiums written of ¥4824.99B; initiates FY24 outlook
attributes.content:
• Tokio Marine Holdings press release (OTCPK:TKOMY): FY GAAP EPS of ¥351.59.
  • Net premiums written of ¥4824.99B (+7.9% Y/Y).
  • Net cash provided by operating activities increased by ¥64.4 billion to ¥1,072.1 billion compared to the previous fiscal year.
  • As a result, Cash and cash equivalents at the end of the year were ¥1,086.9 billion, an increase of ¥101.5 billion from that as of March 31, 2023.
  • Consolidated Business Forecasts for the fiscal year 2024: The company's consolidated business forecasts for the fiscal year 2024 are ¥1,200.0 billion for Ordinary profit and ¥870.0 billion for net income attributable to owners of the parent; Net income per share - Basic of ¥440.99.
  • Net premiums written, and Life insurance premiums are projected to be ¥5,240.0 billion and ¥870.0 billion respectively.
  • Net incurred losses related to natural catastrophes occurring during the period are projected to be ¥136.0 billion in Japan and ¥89.0 billion outside Japan.

attributes.originalTitle: Tokio Marine GAAP EPS of ¥351.59, net premiums written of ¥4824.99B; initiates FY24 outlook

attributes.bio:
Meghavi Singh is an editor on the India news team of Seeking Alpha, based in Pune.

Before joining Seeking Alpha in 2020, she worked with HSBC Bank for 12+ years in the wealth management and Regulatory Reporting departments. Prior to HSBC, she began her career with Gridstone Research, a financial research start-up, as a research associate for a period of 3 years, tracking company events and financial results for the US Consumer Sector.

She has two daughters and lives in Pune, India.
